articles.author: Miranda Bryant
articles.title: First Thing: US in race against Delta variant as Covid cases rise in nearly half of states - The Guardian
articles.description: More than nine out of 10 Americans who died from coronavirus in June were unvaccinated and Delta accounts for more than 50% of new cases. Plus, the world’s largest cherry
articles.content:
Good morning
The US is in a race against the Delta variant amid rising Covid cases in nearly half of states and fears of another surge.

articles.title: Kids and tax cuts: Why Dems need a sales pitch to seal a major Biden win - POLITICO
articles.description: Democrats passed a child tax credit that will represent thousands of dollars for American families. Now, they have to sell it.
articles.content: The fate of the credit itself is at stake, with Democrats under intense pressure to ward off potential rollout problems as they push for a permanent expansion of the policy in the partys next big spe… [+5624 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Move over Messi -- Argentina has a new hero - The Star Online
articles.description: BRASILIA (Reuters) -     Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and on Tuesday he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.
